settings.title: MANHATTAN, KS
settings.text: Our flagship store is located less than 30 minutes from our ranch and processing facilities. It's equipped with a "sampling kitchen" that invites guests to try a freshly seared bite of Wagyu steak and taste the difference for themselves.
settings.time:
Monday-Saturday: 9 a.m. - 6 p.m.
Sunday: 10 a.m. - 5 p.m.

settings.title: OVERLAND PARK, KS
settings.text: Located at 135th and Metcalf Avenue in the Kansas City metro area, this store is open seven days a week to help you elevate your beef all week long.
settings.time:
Monday-Saturday: 9 a.m. - 7 p.m.
Sunday: 10 a.m. - 5 p.m.

settings.title: WICHITA, KS
settings.text:
Booth Creek Wagyu & Seafood Shop
Located at North 21st and Webb in Wichita, KS, this store showcases our premium Wagyu beef alongside a variety of seafood. This store is a destination for those who appreciate the finest quality and variety. Open seven days a week, we invite you to elevate your dining experience.
settings.time:
Monday-Friday: 9 a.m. - 6 p.m.
Saturday: 9 a.m. - 5 p.m.
Sunday: 10 a.m. - 5 p.m.

settings.text:
With four retail locations across the state of Kansas, we are thrilled to have the opportunity to discuss our passion for Wagyu with those who enter our store.

If you are in the area of Manhattan, Overland Park, Prairie Village, or Wichita, Kansas, be sure to stop by to purchase premium Wagyu, sample some of our favorite cuts, and to learn more about the Booth Creek mission. We are looking forward to seeing you!
